actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Douglas. Petition No: 101-7.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 350) proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States authorizing the Congress and the States to prohibit the physical descrecration of the flag of the United States.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.J. Res. 350 (flag desecration).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 350) proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States authorizing the Congress and the States to prohibit the physical descrecration of the flag of the United States.
